# Objectifs
- Comparer plusieurs modeles de classification.
- Selectionner le meilleur et le sauvegarder.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
source("../R/train_model.R")
source("../R/preprocess.R")
```

## Preparation des donnees
```{r data}
raw_df <- readr::read_csv("data/raw/matches.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
processed_df <- preprocess_matches(raw_df)
```

## Entrainement
```{r train}
model <- train_outcome_model(processed_df)
model
save_model(model)
```
